refnamediv.refpurpose: Grabs and returns a frame from a opened video file or camera (experimental)

varlistentry.listitem: The returned frame/image. If no frame, return 0.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: avireadframe grabs and returns a frame from an opened video file or camera. It can only get the current frame and move to the pointer to the next frame.
Video support for SIVP is only available when SIVP is compiled with OpenCV which support video I/O.
